wikipedia_page.main: Ross Smith (born 21 February 1992, in Glasgow) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a defender for West of Scotland Football League club Kilwinning Rangers. His previous clubs include Dundee United, Peterhead, Stenhousemuir and Stirling Albion.

response: *Ross Smith (Scottish footballer) (born 1992), Scottish association football player

*Ross Smith (rugby union) (1929–2002), New Zealand rugby union player
*Ross Smith (Australian politician) (born 1938), member of the Victorian Legislative Assembly
*Ross Smith Secondary School, Australia, named after the aviator
